name: Crisis VRigade
description: Crisis VRigade is a virtual reality action filled first person shooter that lets players take on the role of a SWAT trooper and deal with a hostage situation in a bank robbery.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
